00076 void ssyrkSC(char uplo, char trans, int n, int k,
00077                      real alpha, real * restrict a, int lda,
00078              real beta,  real * restrict c, int ldc)
00079 {
00080   // real case; 'C' and 'T' has same meaning
00081   if((trans=='c') || (trans=='C')) trans = 'T';
00082   ssyrkInternal(uplo, trans, n, k, alpha, a,
00083                   lda, a, lda, beta, c, ldc);
00084 }
